title: Annie will grow up to be a psycho.
body: I just had a cute little annie mid tell me to slit my throat and asked for my address, following me around all game laughing. Annie is on the path to an asylum, Riot please correct her lore.

replies.body: True, the irony of fetishes is that they're always denied to you once revealed.
Tell her "that's my fetish :)" and she'll back away.

I thought she was already a psycho.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/000/130/disaster-girl.jpg
